title: Cant import caffe2.python
body_html:
Hi,
Is it still possible to build whl package with only Caffe2 without pytorch?
In installation docs of caffe2 written that only thing that I need to build it is call python setup.py with FULL_CAFFE2=1 flag.
But according to this commit, possibility of building caffe2 is deprecated or am I wrong?

@oxygenxo, this will interest you :)
body_text:
Hi,
Is it still possible to build whl package with only Caffe2 without pytorch?
In installation docs of caffe2 written that only thing that I need to build it is call python setup.py with FULL_CAFFE2=1 flag.
But according to this commit, possibility of building caffe2 is deprecated or am I wrong?
@oxygenxo, this will interest you :)
body:
Hi, 
Is it still possible to build whl package with only Caffe2 without pytorch?
In installation [docs](https://caffe2.ai/docs/getting-started.html?platform=ubuntu&configuration=compile) of caffe2 written that only thing that I need to build it is call python setup.py with FULL_CAFFE2=1 flag.
But according to [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/commit/802d21c8f4502b2ea6ff866bcaf5fef38c026546) commit, possibility of building caffe2 is deprecated or am I wrong? 


@oxygenxo, this will interest you :)
